name: @oneoffcoder/zava

scripts.compodoc: compodoc -p tsconfig.lib.json -n zava --hideGenerator --customFavicon docs/favicon.ico --customLogo docs/logo.png --includes docs --includesName More -a docs/images src -s -w

description: Parallel coordinates with Grand Tour for exploratory data visualization of massive and high-dimensional data in TypeScript. If you want a desktop application for use, try [VizApp](https://github.com/oneoffcoder/vizapp).
author: Jee Vang, Ph.D. <vangjee@gmail.com> (https://www.oneoffcoder.com)
